name: Night Defender
description:
Description

Night defender is a fast-paced tower defense game. You have only 1 turret that you can move about to suit your current situation.
Upgrade it and tear through as many enemies as you can. Now, it's time to see how long you can survive.

 

Game made during Mini Jam 105

Theme of the jam: Dreamy

Limitation: Every Playthrough is Unique

Controls

WASD to move.

Space to pick up and place your tower.

Left mouse button to select upgrade.

F11 to toggle fullscreen.
